author: ibrokemy.computer

changelog.release_notes: Added Pebble Time support. Color options coming soon.

description:
***FREE for the first 10 people to install it. Simply use the discount code "TRYITOUT" at checkout. Please let me know if you have any problems with using the new KiezelPay feature.***

This is the PAID version of my first Pebble watchface. The trial period will last 1 hour, after which you will need to pay for the watchface.

This simplistic watchface features a minimal vertical battery meter, Wunderground weather (I find it to be more accurate than OpenWeather) with PDC icons, time and date. 

Settings page allows for inverting the color, 12/24hr time, and C/F temperature units. It also allows you to add a custom location for the weather (useful if you have GPS disabled on your device.) I will soon be adding a weather update interval, but for now it is set to 30 minutes.

A free API key from https://wunderground.com/weather/api is required to make the weather work, otherwise only the time/date/battery are shown. 

Please give it a heart if you like it, and I will gladly try to fulfill requests.

Thank you very very much for donating!

latest_release.release_notes: Added Pebble Time support. Color options coming soon.

title: Wunder Weather: Donate
